capabilities.name: Deliver Results
capabilities.description: The role requires achieving results through efficient use of resources and a commitment to quality outcomes in field operations, maintenance activities, and project delivery.

capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: Involves planning, prioritisation, scheduling, and tracking of works and resources, essential for the effective delivery of projects and work programs.

capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: Requires well-developed communication skills for collaboration with stakeholders, contractors, and staff.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: Coordination with the Team Leader Field Operations, other field team supervisors, and external parties is crucial for the role.

capabilities.name: Project Management
capabilities.description: Understanding and applying effective planning, coordination, and control methods to manage multiple concurrent projects.

capabilities.name: Manage Reform and Change
capabilities.description: Supports and promotes change in field operations and maintenance activities, adapting to new methods or processes.

capabilities.name: Demonstrate Accountability
capabilities.description: Responsible for own actions, adherence to legislation and policy, and proactive risk management in field operations.

capabilities.name: Finance
capabilities.description: Involves budget management and reporting, ensuring value for money in project execution.

skills.name: Leadership in Field Operations
skills.description: Supervisory and team leadership skills for the implementation of field and operational activities.

skills.name: Budgeting and Financial Management
skills.description: Ability to manage budgets, perform cost estimation, and financial planning for projects.

skills.name: Stakeholder Engagement
skills.description: Collaborating with stakeholders, contractors, and staff to effectively plan and deliver projects.

generalRole.title: Environmental Field Supervisor
generalRole.description: This role involves supervising and coordinating field operations related to environmental conservation, including maintenance, construction, and land management tasks. It requires a blend of technical skills, project management, and stakeholder engagement to ensure the protection and sustainable management of natural resources.
